#summary 2D -> 3D with the RDKit
#labels Tutorial

Simplest possible approach:
{{{
from rdkit import Chem
from rdkit.Chem import AllChem
m = Chem.MolFromSmiles('c1ccccc1C(=O)O')
AllChem.EmbedMolecule(m)
# the molecule now has a crude conformation, clean it up:
AllChem.UFFOptimizeMolecule(m)
}}}

It's also possible to generate multiple conformations:
{{{
from rdkit import Chem
from rdkit.Chem import AllChem
m = Chem.MolFromSmiles('c1ccccc1C(=O)O')
confIds=AllChem.EmbedMultipleConfs(m,10)
# the molecule now has crude conformations, clean them up:
for confId in confIds:
  AllChem.UFFOptimizeMolecule(m,confId=confId)
}}}
